description:
Manage a hosted website

Learn some important features on how to manage a hosted website

Hosted websites are now diffused all around the internet world .

This course will target people who have reserved a hosted website and would like to have a quick guide on some important features to manage their hosted website with .

In this course you will see a quick overview about the web hosting industry and you will learn some important features like how to send emails , how to take backups for your website , how to fight spams , how to install wordpress ,how to upload / download files to your website , etc .

We will be focusing on the ( cpanel ) web hosting management software in this course .
title: Manage a hosted website (Quick Guide)
